sentences.en: From his outlandish statements, I think your friend is out to lunch.
sentences.cn: 从你朋友稀奇古怪的话看来, 我觉得他像是脑子有点问题.

sentences.en: Grass's novels are peopled with outlandish characters.
sentences.cn: 格拉斯的小说里都是些稀奇古怪的人物。

sentences.en: He wondered if the idea wasn't just a little too flaky, a little too outlandish.
sentences.cn: 他怀疑这个想法不仅仅是有点太古怪、太离奇而已。

sentences.en: He wore an outlandish outfit of pink pants and green sneakers.
sentences.cn: 他穿了一套稀奇古怪的衣装,粉红色裤子、绿色旅游鞋.

sentences.en: Her outlandish attire made her conspicuous in the crowd.
sentences.cn: 她异国风格的服饰使她在人群中很打眼.

sentences.en: Her views on children are rather outlandish.
sentences.cn: 她对儿童的看法很奇怪.

sentences.en: Nor is it an entirely outlandish view.
sentences.cn: 这也不全是个奇异的视角.

sentences.en: The most outlandish people can be the stimulus for love.
sentences.cn: 最容易刺激恋情发生的人往往是异国他乡的人.

sentences.en: There are quite some people swaggering through the streets in outlandish clothes.
sentences.cn: 穿着奇装异服招摇过市的大有人在.

sentences.en: There was a big outlandish parrot on each side of the clock.
sentences.cn: 这座钟的两旁,立着一对奇异的大鹦鹉.

sentences.en: They appeared at parties in outlandish clothes.
sentences.cn: 他们穿着奇装异服参加各种聚会。

sentences.en: They tend to like wigs that are stylish, but not too outlandish.
sentences.cn: 你往往喜欢那种时髦但并不太怪异的假发.

sentences.en: They were dressed in a quaint , outlandish fashion Washington Irving.
sentences.cn: 他们的穿着风格怪异(华盛顿·欧文).

sentences.en: This idea is not as outlandish as it sounds.
sentences.cn: 这主意听上去荒诞不经，实际并非如此。

sentences.en: To wear outlandish or improper clothes in any place is strictly prohibited.
sentences.cn: 外出时不得涉及不正当场所或穿著奇装异服.

trans.tran_cn: 古怪的，奇异的，异国风味的，粗鲁笨拙
